pageTitle: There's a problem with the service - error 500 - Send an SR1 - GOV.UK
h1: There's a problem with the service - error 500
p2: We have not saved your answers. When the service is available, you will have to start again.
p3: If you continue to have problems please contact the NHS Service Desk at: ssd.nationalservicedesk@nhs.net
p4: If you do not have an account to log incidents with the NHS National Service Desk call 0300 303 5035.
h2: If you need to complete an SR1 form now
p5: You can complete PDF versions of the SR1 and the fee claim forms online. They do not need to be signed, but youâ€™ll need to return them to us from a secure email address. Any email that does not come from a secure email address will be automatically deleted.

section1.p2: Send the request for a PDF version of the SR1 form, and fee claim form if needed, from your secure email address to form.e-sr1@dwp.gov.uk. Please include your:

p6: Do not encrypt any part of the email.
